Package com.chillycheesy.modulo.modules

Class ModuleLoader

java.lang.Object
com.chillycheesy.modulo.modules.ModuleLoader
public class ModuleLoader extends Object
Class that build and load all the Module in the modules folder.

  • Method Details

    • loadModules

      public List<Module> loadModules​(File file) throws FileIsNotAModuleDirectoryException, IOException
      Load jar inside a folder if the jar was a module. It will call the load method of the module.
      Parameters:
      file - folder to load.
      Throws:
      FileIsNotAModuleDirectoryException - If the target path was not a module directory.
      IOException - If the file was not a JarFile.

    • loadModules

      public List<Module> loadModules​(String filepath) throws FileIsNotAModuleDirectoryException, IOException
      Method call to load the jar files in a folder path. It will call the load method of the module.
      Parameters:
      filepath - path of the folder file.
      Throws:
      FileIsNotAModuleDirectoryException - If the target path was not a module directory.
      IOException - If the file was not a JarFile.

    • loadModule

      public Module loadModule​(Module module)
      Load a module already built
      It will call the load method of the module.
      Parameters:
      module - The module you want to load.

    • loadModule

      public Module loadModule​(File file) throws IOException
      Load a module.
      Parameters:
      file - The jar file. It should be a module.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file was not a JarFile.

    • loadModule

      public Module loadModule​(File file, URLClassLoader urlClassLoader) throws IOException
      Load a module.
      Parameters:
      file - The jar file. It should be a module.
      urlClassLoader - The used classLoader.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file was not a JarFile.

    • startModules

      public List<Module> startModules() throws MissingDependenciesModuleException
      Put and start all loaded modules in the ModuleManager.
      Throws:
      MissingDependenciesModuleException

    • startModules

      public List<Module> startModules​(List<Module> modules) throws MissingDependenciesModuleException
      Throws:
      MissingDependenciesModuleException

    • startModule

      public Module startModule​(Module module) throws MissingDependenciesModuleException
      Throws:
      MissingDependenciesModuleException

    • loadModule

      public void loadModule​(String filepath) throws IOException
      Load a module from a jar file path
      Parameters:
      filepath - jar file path you want to load
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file was not a JarFile.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid​(JarFile file)
      Check if a jar file is in the good format
      see ModuleBuilder for details.
      Parameters:
      file - Jar file you want to check.
      Returns:
      True if it's valid, false if it isn't.

    • isValid

      public boolean isValid​(File file) throws IOException
      Check if a file is in the good format
      see ModuleBuilder for details.
      Parameters:
      file - File you want to check
      Returns:
      True if it's valid, false if it isn't
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file was not a JarFile.

      Check if a jar file is in the good format
      see ModuleBuilder for details.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if it's valid, false if it isn't
      Throws:
